description:
Fighting For Fairness. Fighting Against Injustice.

Every day, the attorneys at Hall Law P.A. share the same goal. They fight for the fair treatment their clients need and deserve following catastrophic accidents. Insurance companies, product manufacturers and other corporate entities possess vast power and seemingly endless resources. Over time, their influence has only increased, requiring our lawyers to keep pace with them.

In the moments following an accident, victims need a powerful voice to overcome the obstacles they face. Fighting sizable opposition without equally strong legal advocacy ignores the complexity of personal injury claims and undermines the strongest of cases.

Reputable Attorneys Known For Record-Setting, Million-Dollar Verdicts

Hall Law P.A. is well-known throughout the legal community and the insurance industry for million-dollar results that have set new records for verdicts and settlements in Minnesota. Regardless of the size or complexity of a personal injury claim, we review all types of cases and champion the causes of our fellow Minneapolis residents. All Minnesotans need that level of legal advocacy when so much is at stake.

The legal team at our law firm is composed of lawyers possessing decades of experience and significant achievements in negotiating and litigating. They provide a higher level of sophisticated, yet personalized legal representation. They attend to every detail in identifying the unique aspects of personal injury claims and customize strategies to secure the best resolution.

Simply stated, they strive to do the right thing in their pursuit of justice.

The Minneapolis-based law office of Hall Law P.A. is open from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday through Friday. Our lawyers also meet with clients on evenings and weekends by appointment.
